00058             function                set_add_limitations( $theAddLimitation )
00059             {
00060                   try
00061                   {
00062                         if( $this->AddLimitations === '1 = 1' )
00063                         {
00064                               $this->AddLimitations = $theAddLimitation;
00065                         }
00066                         else
00067                         {
00068                               throw( new Exception( '"AddLimitations" was already set' ) );
00069                         }
00070                   }
00071                   catch( Exception $e )
00072                   {
00073                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00074                   }
00075             }

00103             function                add_message_to_log( $Severity , $Title , $Description )
00104             {
00105                   try
00106                   {
00107                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00108                         $Severity = $Security->get( $Severity , 'integer' );
00109                         $Title = $Security->get( $Title , 'command' );
00110                         $Description = $Security->get( $Description , 'raw' );
00111                         
00112                         $Database = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00113                         $Database->insert( 
00114                               'umx_error_log' , 'severity , title , description , error_date' , 
00115                               "$Severity , '$Title' , '$Description' , NOW()"
00116                         );
00117                         $Database->commit();
00118                   }
00119                   catch( Exception $e )
00120                   {
00121                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00122                   }
00123             }

00143             function                unsafe_select_messages( $Condition = '1 = 1' )
00144             {
00145                   try
00146                   {                 
00147                         $Database = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00148                         $Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00149                         $Results = $Database->select( '*' , 'umx_error_log' , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND $Condition" );
00150                         return( $Results );
00151                   }
00152                   catch( Exception $e )
00153                   {
00154                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00176             function                delete_error_log( $id )
00177             {
00178                   try
00179                   {
00180                         $Database = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00181                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00182                         
00183                         $id = $Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00184                         $Database->delete( 'umx_error_log' , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND id = $id" );
00185                         $Database->commit();
00186                   }
00187                   catch( Exception $e )
00188                   {
